original_title: 牝と淫獣 お尻でクラクラ
overview: Daisuke Goto, director of "SASORI IN USA" and "82 minutes", created a unique pink film that blends live-action and anime. Delusional office lady Shizuka, who has been hunted down by bullying inside the company, cheeks on Tanishi who was in the aquarium. When I woke up, something was wrong with her body... Mitsusa Wada of "Cape's brother and sister" starred in the movie for the first time. An R15+ re-edition version of the adult movie "Female and Dirty Beasts, Kurakura".
title: Mesu to injû: Oshiri de kurakura
